name: dmresv

stmt.origin: 3eqtri(cdm(cres(c0, universe)), cdm(c0), cin(universe, cdm(c0)), cin(cdm(c0), universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(cres(c0, universe)), cdm(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(cres(c0, universe)), cin(universe, cdm(c0)))
-| wceq(cin(universe, cdm(c0)), cin(cdm(c0), universe))
-| wceq(cin(cdm(c0), universe), cdm(c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom((c0 |` 𝕌))= dom(c0)
⊣ dom((c0 |` 𝕌))=(𝕌 ⋂ dom(c0))
⊣ (𝕌 ⋂ dom(c0))=(dom(c0)⋂ 𝕌)
⊣ (dom(c0)⋂ 𝕌)= dom(c0)
